5.3 DUIM-Sheets Module

medium-clipping-region

Generic function

Summary

Returns the clipping region for the specified medium.

Signature

medium-clipping-region medium => region

Arguments

medium
An instance of type <medium>.

Values

region
An instance of type <region>.

Library

duim-sheets

Module

duim-sheets

Description

Returns the clipping region for medium.

See also

medium-clipping-region-setter, page 301

Functional Developer Library Reference: DUIM - 3 Dec 1998
